install.name: Content - Vyty Check-In
install.author: Vyty.com
install.description:
Vyty Check-In is a plugin that gemify your site by adding a check-in button on your web pages. It will help you to increase the engagament of your readers.

Download more gamification extensions

Please, vote for the plugin on Joomla! Extensions Directory

param.name: position
param.label: Position
param.description: A position where you want to put buttons.

param.name: excludeSections
param.label: Exclude sections
param.description: List with excluded sections divided by comma. You must enter the IDs of sections.

param.name: excludeCats
param.label: Exclude categories
param.description: List with excluded categories divided by comma. You must enter the IDs of categories.

param.name: excludeArticles
param.label: Exclude articles
param.description: List of excluded articles divided by comma. You must enter the IDs of articles.

param.name: includeArticles
param.label: Display in that articles
param.description: Displays the buttons in these articles notwithstanding the exclusion settings. You must enter the IDs of articles.

param.name: checkinButton
param.label: Check-in Button
param.description: Show or hide the check-in button.

param.name: checkinImpCode
param.label: Implementation Code
param.description: Put the implementation code. That is the code that initialize the widgets. If the code has been installed, it is not necessary to put the code again.

param.name: gameId
param.label: Game Id
param.description: Enter the ID of the game.

param.name: checkinLayout
param.label: Check-In Layout
param.description: Select the layout of the check-in button.
